```{r ent53B hits}
besthits <- read.csv("./data/besthits_ent53B.csv")

```

```{r genes}
enkb <- besthits %>% filter(query=="enkB") 
enkb1 <- besthits %>% filter(query=="enkB1") 
```

```{r phenotypic analysis}
enkb_isolates <- enkb %>% select(source)
mlst_isolate <- read.csv("./data/first_efm_pr_bl_mlst_dateQ.csv",sep='\t')


merged <- merge(enkb_isolates,mlst_isolate,by="source", all.x=TRUE) %>% select(c("source","st"))
first <- merged %>% group_by(st) %>% arrange(st) %>% filter(row_number()==1) 
```
